words_with_descriptions.cliff: A steep rock face, especially at the edge of the sea.
words_with_descriptions.brook: A small, natural stream of fresh water.
words_with_descriptions.vein: A distinct layer of minerals within a rock, often visible and different from the surrounding material.
words_with_descriptions.firth: A long, narrow inlet of the sea, especially in Scotland.
words_with_descriptions.haze: A slight obscuration of the lower atmosphere, typically caused by fine suspended particles.
words_with_descriptions.bluff: A steep cliff, bank, or promontory.
words_with_descriptions.grove: A small group of trees, typically without undergrowth.
